languages.text: {n}Капеллан кивает.{/n} "Не удивлен. Дензу нравились яркие люди. И он тоже умел нравиться".
{n}Chaplain nods.{/n} "Unsurprising. Denz did like remarkable people. And he knew how to get people to like him."
languages.original_text: {n}Капеллан кивает.{/n} "Не удивлен. Дензу нравились яркие люди. И он тоже умел нравиться".

traits.locale_text: {n}Chaplain nods.{/n} "Unsurprising. Denz did like remarkable people. And he knew how to get people to like him."
{n}Chaplain nods.{/n} "Unsurprising. Denz did like remarkable people. And he knew how to get people to like him."

{n}Chaplain nods.{/n} "Unsurprising. Denz did like remarkable people. And he knew how to get people to like him."

languages.text: {n}牧师点了点头。{/n}“这并不令人意外。丹兹喜欢出色的人，而且他也知道怎么让大家喜欢他。”
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain nods.{/n} "Unsurprising. Denz did like remarkable people. And he knew how to get people to like him."

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师点了点头。{/n}“这并不令人意外。丹兹喜欢出色的人，而且他也知道怎么让大家喜欢他。”

languages.text: {n}Capellán asiente.{/n} «No me sorprende. Denz sentía afinidad por la gente más ilustre y podía encandilar a cualquiera».
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain nods.{/n} "Unsurprising. Denz did like remarkable people. And he knew how to get people to like him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Capellán asiente.{/n} «No me sorprende. Denz sentía afinidad por la gente más ilustre y podía encandilar a cualquiera».

languages.text: {n}教戒官はうなずいた。{/n}「驚きはしません。デンツは傑出した人が好きでした。そして、人に好かれる術も熟知していた」
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain nods.{/n} "Unsurprising. Denz did like remarkable people. And he knew how to get people to like him."

traits.locale_text: {n}教戒官はうなずいた。{/n}「驚きはしません。デンツは傑出した人が好きでした。そして、人に好かれる術も熟知していた」

languages.text: {n}Ordenspriester nickt.{/n} "Das ist keine Überraschung. Denz mochte bemerkenswerte Menschen. Und er konnte andere dazu bringen, ihn zu mögen."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain nods.{/n} "Unsurprising. Denz did like remarkable people. And he knew how to get people to like him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ordenspriester nickt.{/n} "Das ist keine Überraschung. Denz mochte bemerkenswerte Menschen. Und er konnte andere dazu bringen, ihn zu mögen."

languages.text: « Ce n'est guère surprenant, {n}valide Chapelain en hochant la tête.{/n} Denz aimait s'entourer de gens remarquables et il savait se faire apprécier. »
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain nods.{/n} "Unsurprising. Denz did like remarkable people. And he knew how to get people to like him."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est guère surprenant, {n}valide Chapelain en hochant la tête.{/n} Denz aimait s'entourer de gens remarquables et il savait se faire apprécier. »

languages.text: {n}Papaz başını sallıyor.{/n} "Şaşırmadım. Denz, etkileyici insanları severdi. İnsanlara kendini sevdirmeyi de iyi bilirdi."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain nods.{/n} "Unsurprising. Denz did like remarkable people. And he knew how to get people to like him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Papaz başını sallıyor.{/n} "Şaşırmadım. Denz etkileyici insanları severdi. İnsanlara kendini sevdirmeyi de iyi bilirdi."
